      static PatternFormatter.Flags PatternFormatter.Flags.GROUP
      Flag ',' : Group padding for numbers
      static PatternFormatter.Flags PatternFormatter.Flags.LEADING
      Flag ' ' : Space prefix for positive numbers

      Flag '-' : Left justiciation
      static PatternFormatter.Flags PatternFormatter.Flags.NONE
      no flags
      static PatternFormatter.Flags PatternFormatter.Flags.PARENTHESE
      Flag '(" : Parentheses enclosing negative numbers
      static PatternFormatter.Flags PatternFormatter.Flags.PLUS
      Flag '+' : Plus prefix for positive numbers
      static PatternFormatter.Flags PatternFormatter.Flags.UPPER
      Shadow flag (inheritance from the conversion's modifier) : Upper Case
      static PatternFormatter.Flags PatternFormatter.Flags.ZERO_PAD
      Flag '0' : Zero padding for numbers
